title: Enchanting 'Nalla Pusala Dandalu' - Rose Gold & Diamond Mangalsutra Necklace
materials: traditional Black Beads (Nalla Pusalu). Features a durable Hyderabadi polish for lasting brilliance.
features: A contemporary take on the traditional Mangalsutra, this piece features delicate rose gold floral pendants interspersed along a string of fine black beads. Each pendant is intricately set with sparkling diamonds, creating a dazzling effect. The lobster clasp ensures a secure and comfortable fit.
colors: and Brilliant White (Diamonds). A modern twist on the classic black and gold combination.
occasions: and festive occasions. Its subtle elegance also makes it suitable for formal events.
description: Combines the traditional significance of a Mangalsutra with a modern aesthetic. The diamonds offer a touch of luxury, while the rose gold provides a warm and feminine appeal. The durable Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting shine. It's a symbol of eternal love and commitment with a contemporary flair.
